name: The Ghost on The Shore/Hantu Laut
name_original: The Ghost on The Shore/Hantu Laut
description:
A Simple game for nanoreno entry, dunno if this is can be called nanoreno game lol. The one who make this VN is only me alone, but the resources are from inet and i had put the credit in the true ending one.

Just a simple story about two boys who went stargazing from the shore, but they found something surprising. Available in both english and indonesian.

Probably need some improvement, i upload this immediately because i'm ill and afraid if i can't finish this.

four ending : 2 bad, 1 true, 1 normal.
